about_the_game:
Greetings and Salutations!
Welcome to the ISL (Interstellar Sports League) and the EXCITING world of Angular Velocity, the only sanctioned competitive high speed disc game!

In Angular Velocity, you and up to three other pilots are pitted against another motley crew of disc jockeys as you catch, pass, and score goals in stadiums across the civilized planets represented by the League!

Find your place amongst the stars and reach new heights of glory in Angular Velocity!!!

Features:


Unlocks
  • Ships
  • Paint jobs
  • Bits and Bobs for your ships
Game Play
  • Single Player Campaign
  • Local split screen multiplayer (up to 4 players!)
  • LAN multiplayer (up to 8 players!)
  • Online Play
  • Ranked matches (Teams or solo)
Planned Updates
  • New ships every 3 months
  • New planets / arenas
detailed_description:
Greetings and Salutations!
Welcome to the ISL (Interstellar Sports League) and the EXCITING world of Angular Velocity, the only sanctioned competitive high speed disc game!

In Angular Velocity, you and up to three other pilots are pitted against another motley crew of disc jockeys as you catch, pass, and score goals in stadiums across the civilized planets represented by the League!

Find your place amongst the stars and reach new heights of glory in Angular Velocity!!!

Game Play

  • Local split screen multiplayer (up to 4 players!)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Best to be on the newest version
  • Processor: Need one of those for sure
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Yep
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: You should have one.
  • Additional Notes: Real values will be added when we have better baselines

name: Angular Velocity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or better
  • Processor: many cores, much wow
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Yep
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: I mean, if you want to hear things, this would be good
  • Additional Notes: Real values will be added when we have better baselines
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
